page.title: 05OUR HOMES 1.
page.content: We live in many different kinds of homes, many people living in houses. {Houses}come in many different styles _ {detached,}on its own _{semi_detached,} two together _ and{terraced,}a row of several.{ Bungalows}are single story houses,{detached or semi_detached, whilst flats, or maisonettes, are homes built in blocks connected by stairs or lifts. People may also live in caravans or mobile homes, homes on wheels that can be moved about. Most of our homes are built of bricks, blocks of baked clay, held together by motar, and covered by a tiled roof. Inside the walls are covered by plaster which is then decorated, gaps are left in the walls for windows and doors. Most homes will have a bathroom and toilet, a kitchen, living areas and sleeping areas, the number depending on sieze.
